events.name: Graphite Supply Chain in Africa
events.wd_description: Analysis of graphite resources, supply chain complexities, and potential for economic growth in Africa, focusing on exploration, mining, processing, manufacturing, and recycling.

events.name: Exploration
events.description: The stage of locating and evaluating potential graphite deposits in Africa

events.name: Processing
events.description: The stage where raw graphite is refined and prepared for manufacturing

events.name: Manufacturing
events.description: The stage where refined graphite is used to produce battery components and other graphite-based products

events.name: Recycling
events.description: The stage where used graphite materials are collected and processed for reuse in new products

events.name: Lack of specialist product manufacturing
events.description: Africa currently lacks the capacity for producing specialist graphite products such as spherical graphite and battery components.

events.name: Regional cooperation potential
events.description: Exploring the potential for regional cooperation within Africa to develop the capacity for producing spherical graphite and other value-added products
